Khonkolor:

Khonkolor forgot Astroblast and screammed "HEY YOU GIANT BOT!!!!!! 
TRY TO STOP THIS...."

He shot a granade with the granade laucher to Menasor's chest

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> The pain searing through his left arm, Menasor finally manages to 
pull it
> out of the force field, and along with it, Firearm's charred body. 
His arm
> he had used lay in absolute ruing, and he nearly dropped Firearm, 
and had
> to switch hands he was using. He again lifted off the ground, his 
charred
> arm laying limp, and headed towards Astroblast, with his prisoner.
